metadata.title: Peptide Quotes (Final)
metadata.note: Curated, benefit-focused quotes approved for use.

quotes.quote: NAD+ plays a pivotal role in cellular metabolism and is a co-substrate for enzymes that play key roles in pathways that modify aging.
quotes.organization: Weill Cornell Medical College

quotes.quote: The first evidence that NAD-boosting could increase lifespan came from studies our laboratory performed in yeast cells over 15 years ago.
quotes.organization: Harvard Medical School

quotes.quote: Oxytocin has taken the lead as the most investigated neurohormone that modulates social cognition, influences parenting behaviors, facilitates within or across-species bonding, and even biologically buffers against stressors such as isolation.
quotes.organization: University of Minnesota

quotes.quote: Our increasing understanding that social connection, community belonging, and trust in others influence both physical and mental health outcomes, has led to numerous intervention and treatment oxytocin studies across a myriad of conditions.
quotes.organization: University of Minnesota

quotes.quote: We previously reported that oxytocin can induce pain relief and described the possibility how oxytocin in the dorsal horn and/or the dorsal root ganglion relieves joint and muscle pain.
quotes.organization: Tokyo Women's Medical University

quotes.quote: In addition, AICAr is still a highly promising pharmacological agent having many beneficial effects in metabolism, hypoxia, exercise, and cancer.
quotes.organization: Cells Journal

quotes.quote: Ipamorelin is a new and potent synthetic pentapeptide which has distinct and specific growth hormone (GH)-releasing properties.
quotes.organization: European Journal of Endocrinology

quotes.quote: Tesamorelin, a growth hormone-releasing hormone analog, has previously demonstrated significant reductions in visceral adipose fat in two phase 3 randomized controlled trials in people with HIV.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed clinical research

quotes.quote: Reductions in excess visceral fat with tesamorelin led to a significant reduction in forecasted cardiovascular disease risk in people with HIV, even among those heavily treated with lipid-lowering therapy.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed clinical research

quotes.quote: LL-37 demonstrates potent antimicrobial activity across a broad spectrum of pathogens, with engineered analogs improving stability while maintaining efficacy.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed journal review

quotes.quote: Cagrilintide shows comparable weight loss to semaglutide or liraglutide with significantly lower vomiting.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed journal

quotes.quote: Current evidence suggests cagrilintide is safe, effective, and reduces body weight in patients with type 2 diabetes, helping regulate glucose homeostasis.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed journal

quotes.quote: Thymosin alpha‑1 significantly reduced the overall incidence of extra‑pancreatic infections in severe acute pancreatitis, with reductions observed in blood and abdominal infections.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed journal

quotes.quote: Semaglutide promotes weight loss, improves metabolic health, and offers benefits across related conditions, with a favorable clinical profile in type 2 diabetes and obesity.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed journal

quotes.quote: Clinicians should consider semaglutide’s benefits including improved quality of life and reduced hospitalizations alongside its safety profile and side effects.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed journal

quotes.quote: In adults with obesity or overweight, tirzepatide was associated with body weight reduction and improvements in insulin sensitivity and β‑cell function.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed clinical study

quotes.quote: Tirzepatide improved β‑cell function and insulin sensitivity, partly independent of weight reduction, supporting its efficacy in metabolic health.
quotes.organization: Peer-reviewed clinical study

quotes.quote: Of particular interest are retro-analogs of LL-37, which maintain the amphipathic α-helical conformation essential for membrane interaction, while showing enhanced resistance to proteolytic degradation and potent antimicrobial activity across a broad spectrum of pathogens.
quotes.organization: Antimicrobial Peptides of the Cathelicidin Family: Focus on LL-37 and Its Modifications

quotes.quote: Randomized controlled studies comparing the efficacy of Tα1 as intervention measure with non-Tα1 in improving immune regulation for patients with SAP were included.
quotes.organization: Thymosin alpha 1 alleviates inflammation and prevents infection in patients with severe acute pancreatitis through immune regulation: a systematic review and meta-analysis.

quotes.quote: Abstract Introduction To investigate the efficacy and safety of pulsatile gonadotropin-releasing hormone pump therapy in male infants with congenital hypogonadotropic hypogonadism.
quotes.organization: Efficacy and safety of pulsatile GnRH pump therapy in male infants with congenital hypogonadotropic hypogonadism.

quotes.quote: On the one hand, by secreting and metabolizing glutathione, superoxide dismutase, and polyphenolic substances, reactive oxygen species is directly cleared and oxidative damage is reduced.
quotes.organization: Mechanism and application of yeast and its culture in regulating intestinal antioxidant defense in ruminants.

quotes.quote: Cagrilintide shows comparable weight loss to semaglutide/liraglutide with significantly lower vomiting.
quotes.organization: Efficacy and Safety of Cagrilintide Alone and in Combination with Semaglutide (Cagrisema) as Anti-Obesity Medications: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.

quotes.quote: Overall, the current evidence suggests that both pramlintide and cagrilintide are safe, effective, and promising drugs that successfully reduce body weight in patients with T2DM and consequently regulate glucose homeostasis.
quotes.organization: Amylin, Another Important Neuroendocrine Hormone for the Treatment of Diabesity.

quotes.quote: Mechanistically, NDUSF1 deficiency in alveolar epithelial cells leads to mitochondrial dysfunction such as reduced complex I activity, impaired NAD+ production and increased ROS, these contributed to the decline of ENaCα.
quotes.organization: NDUFS1 upregulates ENaCα by NAD+ to promote alveolar fluid clearance in acute lung injury.

quotes.quote: Supplementing NAD+ via Olaparib treatment alleviated the reduction of ENaCα abundance raised by NDUFS1 deficiency, improved AFC, and suppressed the progression of ALI.
quotes.organization: NDUFS1 upregulates ENaCα by NAD+ to promote alveolar fluid clearance in acute lung injury.

quotes.quote: Thus, this would occur as a highly controlling beneficial action, activating an effect ascribed to BPC 157’s therapeutic effect, depending on the disturbed circumstances.
quotes.organization: Stable Gastric Pentadecapeptide BPC 157 as a Therapy and Safety Key: A Special Beneficial Pleiotropic Effect Controlling and Modulating Angiogenesis and the NO-System.

quotes.quote: This systematic review and meta-analysis (SRM) holistically analyzed the body weight lowering, glycemic efficacy, and safety of survodutide.
quotes.organization: Efficacy and Safety of Twincretin Survodutide, a Dual Glucagon-Like Peptide-1 and Glucagon Receptor Agonist as an Anti-Obesity and Anti-Diabetes Medication: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.

quotes.quote: Survodutide at 2.4 mg : −11.54, −4.07); I 2 = 98%; P < 0.01] and 3.6 mg was associated with significantly greater percent reductions in body weight compared to placebo.
quotes.organization: Efficacy and Safety of Twincretin Survodutide, a Dual Glucagon-Like Peptide-1 and Glucagon Receptor Agonist as an Anti-Obesity and Anti-Diabetes Medication: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.

quotes.quote: Our previous research has implied that vasoactive intestinal peptide (VIP) reduces high IOP by regulating the distribution of F-actin in the endothelial cells of Schlemm’s canal.
quotes.organization: Vasoactive intestinal peptide reduces ocular hypertension by regulating tight junction of trabecular meshwork through Rab13/PKA signalling complex.

quotes.quote: Furthermore, both VIP and the overexpression of Rab13 reduced the expression of TJ-related proteins ZO-1 and Claudin-1 in pressure-stimulated HTMCs.
quotes.organization: Vasoactive intestinal peptide reduces ocular hypertension by regulating tight junction of trabecular meshwork through Rab13/PKA signalling complex.

quotes.quote: Objectives Evaluate the short‐ and long‐term safety and clinical effectiveness of afamelanotide 16 mg in EPP patients enrolled in the PASS in Germany.
quotes.organization: German Cohort Observational Study to Investigate the Short- and Long-Term Safety and Clinical Effectiveness of Afamelanotide 16 mg (SCENESSE) in Patients With Erythropoietic Protoporphyria (EPP).

quotes.quote: Afamelanotide is a highly effective and safe treatment for EPP patients.
quotes.organization: German Cohort Observational Study to Investigate the Short- and Long-Term Safety and Clinical Effectiveness of Afamelanotide 16 mg (SCENESSE) in Patients With Erythropoietic Protoporphyria (EPP).

quotes.quote: The observations made for the effectiveness outcome data reported show a significant clinical benefit of afamelanotide both from prior to treatment (baseline) and over treatment years.
quotes.organization: German Cohort Observational Study to Investigate the Short- and Long-Term Safety and Clinical Effectiveness of Afamelanotide 16 mg (SCENESSE) in Patients With Erythropoietic Protoporphyria (EPP).

quotes.quote: Circulating immunoglobulin levels enhanced significantly in the GHRP-6/IFA group, suggesting a stimulated humoral immune response.
quotes.organization: The Ghrelin Analog GHRP-6, Delivered Through Aquafeeds, Modulates the Endocrine and Immune Responses of <i>Sparus aurata</i> Following IFA Treatment.

quotes.quote: The coordinated upregulation of anti-inflammatory, antiviral, and humoral markers across intestinal and lymphoid tissues, along with increased plasma Ig levels and reduced cortisol under immune challenge, highlights the dual immunostimulatory and stress-buffering properties of GHRP-6.
quotes.organization: The Ghrelin Analog GHRP-6, Delivered Through Aquafeeds, Modulates the Endocrine and Immune Responses of <i>Sparus aurata</i> Following IFA Treatment.

quotes.quote: Our results indicate that hexarelin effectively antagonized H 2 O 2 -induced damage to Neuro-2A cells thereby (i) improving cell viability, (ii) reducing NO 2 − release and (iii) restoring normal morphologies.
quotes.organization: Hexarelin Modulation of MAPK and PI3K/Akt Pathways in Neuro-2A Cells Inhibits Hydrogen Peroxide-Induced Apoptotic Toxicity.

quotes.quote: Results: Hexarelin induced a significant improvement in lung compliance and a reduction of the number of total immune cells in BAL 24 hours after HCl instillation, accompanied with a lower recruitment of neutrophils compared with the vehicle group.
quotes.organization: Hexarelin modulates lung mechanics, inflammation, and fibrosis in acute lung injury.

quotes.quote: Results Serum Tβ4 levels were significantly lower in patients with KD compared to healthy controls and were further reduced in patients with CALs.
quotes.organization: Association Between Thymosin β4 and Coronary Arterial Lesions in Children with Kawasaki Disease.

quotes.quote: Thymosin beta-4 (TB4), a short, secreted peptide, was shown to possess a beneficial impact regarding myocardial cell survival, coronary re-growth and progenitor cell activation following myocardial infarction in adult mammals.
quotes.organization: Thymosin Beta-4 Modulates Cardiac Remodeling by Regulating ROCK1 Expression in Adult Mammals.

quotes.quote: Results Significantly higher awareness of GLP-1RAs was observed among those attempting weight loss in the past year (85.7% vs 14.3%, p<0.001).
quotes.organization: What are community perspectives and experiences around GLP-1 receptor agonist medications for weight loss? A cross-sectional survey study in the UK.

quotes.quote: Results Seven themes were identified from the analysis: medication efficacy (29.4% of coded posts), psychosocial impact of weight loss (22.8%), side effects management (13.3%), barriers to access (10.7%), lifestyle modification (10.2%), support and community (9.2%), and stigma surrounding use of semaglutide 2.4 mg for weight loss (4.4%).
quotes.organization: A Qualitative Analysis of Patient Experiences Using Semaglutide 2.4 mg for Weight Loss.

quotes.quote: Conclusion In summary, this analysis provides evidence that reductions in excess visceral fat with tesamorelin lead to a significant reduction in forecasted CVD risk in PWH, resulting from reduction in TC even among a group heavily treated with lipid-lowering therapy.
quotes.organization: P-433. Impact of Tesamorelin on Cardiovascular Disease Risk Prediction Scores in Phase 3 Studies Treatment Arms: Subanalysis

quotes.quote: In summary, this analysis provides evidence that reductions in excess visceral fat with tesamorelin lead to a significant reduction in forecasted CVD risk in PWH, resulting from reduction in TC even among a group heavily treated with lipid-lowering therapy.
quotes.organization: P-433. Impact of Tesamorelin on Cardiovascular Disease Risk Prediction Scores in Phase 3 Studies Treatment Arms: Subanalysis

quotes.quote: Reduced appetite was reported by 58.4% of participants (Wegovy®: 54.4%, Ozempic®: 62.1%, Mounjaro®: 56.5%) and increased satiety by 63.5% (Wegovy®: 66.8%, Ozempic®: 58.8%, Mounjaro®: 63.1%).
quotes.organization: Real-world insights into incretin-based therapy: Associations between changes in taste perception and appetite regulation in individuals with obesity and overweight: A cross-sectional study.

quotes.quote: CD4 + CD25 + T cells and OX62 + DCs levels significantly increased in the model group and decreased in the Tα1 and/or VitC treatment groups.
quotes.organization: Immunological responses of septic rats to combination therapy with thymosin α1 and vitamin C.

quotes.quote: These observations thus highlight an additional possible dimension of retatrutide beyond its efficacy regarding glycaemic control and weight reduction.
quotes.organization: Decreases in circulating ANGPTL3/8 concentrations following retatrutide treatment parallel reductions in serum lipids.

quotes.quote: ARA 290, a nonerythropoietic peptide engineered from erythropoietin, improves metabolic control and neuropathic symptoms in patients with type 2 diabetes.
quotes.organization: Molecular Medicine (title statement)
